[i]В каком там году игра вышла? 2008... Нет, однозначно: слишком поздно. В 2006 наверняка... Как, в 2004? *Отвисает челюсть*.[/i]

По сравнению с первой частью, вышедшей за 6 лет ранее, размах просто поражает. Эволюция графики, физики, ИИ, разнообразия геймплейных решений. Это просто что-то с чем-то. Настолько, что движок и графику не пришлось особо менять в течение более чем полутора десятилетия - еще десяток игр самой компании, тысячи модов~ В общем: [b]«Subject: Valve. Status: Reputation absolutely confirmed»[/b].

Esse jogo é uma lenda no mundo dos games,a sua trama é fascinante e envolvente com ótimos personagens,ótima jogabilidade,cenários com muita personalidade e criatividade,um jogo pensado em seus mínimos detalhes o que faz ser apreciado todas as vezes que jogado e mesmo sendo um jogo de 2004 envelheceu tão bem que pode ser jogado até hoje por qualquer um,sua engine é ótima até os dias de hoje,provavelmente que zerou esse jogo vai querer zerar mais vezes.Enfim eu creio que não há dúvidas que esse jogo deva ser comprado e jogado pois não há arrependimentos.
This Game is cool and difficult
It's not as nice as the original, but a pretty good game nonetheless. Worth playing at least once.

优点：不多说了，出色的剧情，极棒的画面与场景设计，敌人和队友的AI也非常真实与智能，弗里曼博士日常哑巴，敌人的设定，从国民护卫队，猎头蟹丧尸，联合军部队，三角机甲，蚁狮种类繁多，各有特色，武器选择多样，各有发挥的场景，队友们的刻画很好，艾利克斯，伊莱，啤酒巴尼，以及那些喊着弗里曼博士，我们跟着你的反抗军，总之很棒！！！
缺点：起源引擎对画面气氛的渲染到极致导致沉浸感很强，因此可能没有3D眩晕的人也会头晕。
i would rate this game a very good/10 harelko points

I've replayed this game in 2020, having a nostalgic touch attached to it.
At its time, was a real achievement and even today still is a fun, puzzling and action-filled game.
Игра, которая опередила своё время. Таких больше не делаю! РЕКОМЕНДУЮ!
逼真的物理模型和布娃娃效果，流畅的操作，身临其境的场景氛围（注：水底蹦出的僵尸可把我结结实实地吓了一跳），紧张刺激的战斗体验，以及语言栏中没有标注却在游戏中意外收获的全中文配音……如此神作即使放到现在也毫不显得逊色，让人很难相信它的诞生已经超过十五个年头，期待着Half-Life 3诞生的那一天！
лучшая игра всех времён и народов!
EXCELLENT GROUNDBREAKING MASTERPIECE, AMAZING DEPRESSING FUN.

Разве что-то еще нужно говорить об этой игре, кроме того, что это одна из величайших игр всех времен и давно уже стала классикой? 
Для своего времени это был просто взрыв мозга. Сейчас, конечно, она смотрится уже не так эффектно, как в 2004, но это нисколько не умаляет её достоинств. Игра - шедевр во всех аспектах! Рекомендую однозначно!
Just completed this piece of work. Jaw still wont come off the floor. Send help!

Una maravilla de juego. Junto con las dos expansiones se hace una experiencia realmente increíble. Lo único negativo que tiene es el doblaje, bastante soso y mediocre. Por el, resto parece mentira que este juego sea de 2004. Fluído en combate, mucha variedad de situaciones y gran narrativa. Recomendadísimo

This is probably the best game I've ever played. I'm not exaggerating, it really may be. And that's saying something, because I have played A LOT of games in my time. It's shameful that I only played it in 2020, but I'm so glad that I finally got around to doing it.

I won't say much because this game is something that you have to experience yourself. I mean it, really. It has some of its flaws, mostly due to its age, but the pros VASTLY overshadow its cons.

EVERYONE should experience Half-Life 2 at least once in their lives, but ESPECIALLY game designers/developers. This game is not only an amazing gaming experience, it is also a masterclass in game design and all that comes with it. I've learned quite a bit from it, and this game is definitely something that will invariably influence all my work from now on. I'm not joking, THAT'S how important this game is. No wonder it was a game-changer in 2004, and it still holds up extremely well 16 years later.

I haven't played Half-Life 2 Episodes 1 and 2 yet, I'll be playing them next. I still don't know what happens in those two mini-sequels to this game, but it's sad that we still have yet to see the conclusion of this story in Half-Life 3 or Half-Life 2 Episode 3. Well, Half-Life Alyx is right around the corner, and while it's not a sequel but a prequel to HL2, it's a sign that Valve hasn't forgotten about the IP and we may eventually get the ending for this story. Here's hoping that Valve only sticks to VR on the spin-off titles, so that in an eventual HL3 people without VR gear can still experience the conclusion to this breathtaking saga.

Now, about the games that came before HL2. I didn't really like Half-Life 1 because of some glaring issues, some due to its age, some inexcuseable. But I gotta say, it was 100% worth it playing it so I could experience Half-Life 2 properly. I would recommend people to NOT play Half-Life 1, but play Black Mesa, a fan remake of HL1 that fixes a lot of what was wrong with it and makes the overall experience more enjoyable. Sure, if you want to play the original HL1 to experience it as it was first released, go for it - just be aware of its many frustrating bits. About the two spinoff titles, Opposing Force and Blue Shift, yeah, definitely play those. They're shorter and run on the same engine as HL1, but I found them to be a lot more fun than the base game. Of course, in order for you to properly enjoy them, you must play the first game first, so there's that. However you choose to do it, just don't play the official Source version of HL1. Please.
我看谁没有买这款游戏
Very fun game! I have played this game so many times yet it never gets old! Also shouldn't it be whole life?

¿Que si recomiendo este juego? ¡Claro que lo recomiendo! Este juego y el resto de la saga es una maravilla en cualquier aspecto. Es de los mejores juegos que he jugado y no hay nada que pueda decir sobre él que no se haya dicho ya; me ha marcado mucho y sé que lo jugaría una y otra vez. Vives una aventura llena de acción y tensión, es una experiencia muy buena.

A game ahead of its time, and a very good successor to the first revolutionary game.

An unthinkable step up from Half-life 1, some many interesting characters and stunning imagery, especially for its time. I haven't even started talking about the gameplay, the puzzles, the story and everything else, it's a roller coaster of thrills and I certainly didn't get bored.                                                                                                  P.S. Just want to specify, I am not at all calling Half-life 1 a bad game, not at all :)

G胖啥时候数3？
怀念老游戏可以试试，难度新手上来先熟悉图这比上来不见人就被秒来的好（怪是会固定刷的）。剧情攻略网上也是有很多，这里说一下V社游戏的速通一般会用到KZ BHOP 一般短期学不来，也就是卡bug能看懂些，推荐多去看多去学。
由于起源引擎的特性，（+本作画面部分较废土压抑）可能会出现晕3D的情况[b] 早期游戏都会有这种情况，现在的第一人称游戏会在视角方面多做优化以至于不会太晕 [/b] 
[h1] 出现不适症状请停下游戏休息
       再根据需要调节画面设置或缩短游戏时间[/h1]
推荐促销买V社大包，一次性享受传送门12 求生12 半衰期12 cs1.6 csgo 等 G胖不会数三合集

A game is really good if you can play with it after 15 years and it still amazes you. No stupid tutorials, great map design, advanced physics (even if you compare it to the recent games). This is the standard, that should be followed.
